author: vexx32
body:
Filing an issue on this as I may not get to this today and do not want to forget about it.

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/540737ebe1eae53fd60c6dcc5a76fe9e8b814ab9/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/parser/tokenizer.cs#L545-L548

This comment is incorrect; the suffix used for BigInteger is actually `N` as can be seen here in the tokenizer code:

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/540737ebe1eae53fd60c6dcc5a76fe9e8b814ab9/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/parser/tokenizer.cs#L4021-L4024

Small thing, but might lead to confusion later on. 🙂
title: Erroneous Comment in tokenizer.cs
